title: siblings add hangs indenfinitely while annex  enabling the remote
body:
#### What is the problem?
this is on 0.9.x branch (0.9.1-249-g4a0e2383) but tried master as well
```shell
(git-annex)hopa:~/picts/mris/QA[master]git-annex
$> datalad -l 2 siblings add -s rolando --url bids@rolando.cns.dartmouth.edu:/inbox/BIDS/dbic/QA
[DEBUG  ] Determined class of decorated function: <class 'datalad.distribution.siblings.Siblings'> 
[Level 5] Parsed ri /home/yoh/picts/mris/QA into fields {'username': '', 'scheme': '', 'fragment': '', 'hostname': '', 'query': '', 'path': '/home/yoh/picts/mris/QA', 'password': '', 'port': ''} 
...
[Level 5] Parsed ri /home/yoh/picts/mris/QA into fields {'username': '', 'scheme': '', 'fragment': '', 'hostname': '', 'query': '', 'path': '/home/yoh/picts/mris/QA', 'password': '', 'port': ''} 
[Level 5] Detected file ri 
[Level 9] Running: ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'annex', 'enableremote', '--debug', '-c', 'remote.rolando.annex-ssh-options=-o ControlMaster=auto -S /home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/810d3ac4', 'rolando'] 

```
- Above command works out just fine if I just run it in the terminal:

```shell
$> 'git' '-c' 'receive.autogc=0' '-c' 'gc.auto=0' 'annex' 'enableremote' '--debug' '-c' 'remote.rolando.annex-ssh-options=-o ControlMaster=auto -S /home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/810d3ac4' 'rolando'                         enableremote rolando ok   
```
so really not sure what could be causing the stuckiness.  Could be due to the settings for that host defined in ~/.ssh/config -- have to jump through smaug with PRoxyCommand:
```shell
Host rolando.cns rolando.cns.dartmouth.edu
 ProxyCommand ssh -q -A smaug.dartmouth.edu 'nc -w1 %h %p'
```
